page.title: 11NAREYS GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: The garden centre is situated just off the A45 near the Stowmarket slip road. The centre covers 8 acres of land.On site there are 9 greenhouses.The house is of a grey/creamy colour brick and is very arge. The 10 members of staff actually work on site.They do varied jobs including planning peoples gardens. Some of the plants come from abroad and have to be checked for poisonous insects. Apart from plants they sell garden ornaments, garden furniture,bird boxes, bird baths,fountains and fish ponds.
